site.description: This repository contains the plugins to transform services following the publish-subscribe paradigm into colored Petri nets. Models are created using Papyrus UML2. Such models are later annotated with the provided publish-subscribe profile.

category-def.name: Publish-Subscribe Tools
category-def.label: Publish-Subscribe Tools
category-def.description: Plug-ins to create and transform UML2 files profiled using the Publish-Subscribe profile.

category-def.name: Publish-Subscribe Tools SDK
category-def.label: Publish-Subscribe Tools SDK
category-def.description: Plug-ins suppoorting the development of tools to create and transform UML2 files profiled using the Publish-Subscribe profile. May install SDK components from other update sites, including the Eclipse site.
